title: Apricot Chicken with Balsamic Vinegar
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons of extra-virgin olive oil', '900g chicken breast fillets, cut into bite-size pieces', '1 pinch salt and pepper to taste', '1 large onion, chopped', '4 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, or to taste', '20 dried apricots (or use 4 fresh apricots, sliced)', '250ml chicken stock', '200g apricot jam', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley']
